name: Selected-activity-recognition
tagline: Selected activities, such as running, jogging, walking and idle are classified. The application made for Android, uses K3DH 3-axis acceleration sensor data for classifying the mentioned activities using machine learning and data mining algorithms.
body:
### Welcome to my site.
My name is Raghu. In this page, I decided to put some information about previous project that I had worked on.
This is not perfect project so I ask everyone to check for the inconsitencies. 

This project is about Linear acceleration data from triaxial sensor used for classifying selected human activities. Selected activities, such as running, jogging, walking and idle are classified. The application made for Android, uses K3DH 3-axis acceleration sensor data for classifying the mentioned activities using Machine learning & Datamining algorithms.

### Setup instructions
* Clone the repository. If you are using eclipse, make sure that the project is imported from Git reopository.
* Go through WEKA ecosystem.
* This repository is used for classifying feature vectors _on-the fly_ .
* Configure build path appropriately.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
